rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer that aligns with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow. The design incorporates Art Deco motifs for an elegant aesthetic.
An open-plan living area merged with the kitchen space. Features luxurious finishes and Art Deco accents with natural light optimally placed as per Vastu guidelines.
Integrated into the open-plan layout, featuring state-of-the-art appliances, marble countertops and sleek cabinetry with Art Deco details. The positioning ensures a harmonious energy flow.
Spacious master bedroom designed for privacy and relaxation, incorporating luxury finishes and Vastu-aligned positioning to promote restful sleep. Features a private balcony with views of the garden.
Modern bathroom adjacent to the bedroom, ensuring convenience while following Vastu principles for water placement and privacy.

A dedicated home theater space with soundproofing and optimal acoustics, decorated in Art Deco style. This room is designed to provide an immersive entertainment experience while aligning with energy flow.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned to maximize positive energy according to Vastu. Features Art Deco detailing.
Large windows for enhanced natural lighting and ventilation, carefully placed to ensure balanced energy flow.
A dedicated entrance leading directly to the large garden area, emphasizing connection with nature while adhering to Vastu principles.

garden.description: Expansive garden space designed for relaxation and leisure. Features a mix of indoor-outdoor living elements and landscaped with native plants following local aesthetic norms.
